title: RokBAND Multi-Functional Holiday Running Neck Gaiter or Headband | Thanksgiving Turkey Trot Styles
features: RUN NOW GOBBLE LATER! Made from Polyester Performance Microfiber, our Thanksgiving themed RokBANDs are fashionable AND functional to keep you looking spirited! Stay dry during runs, practice, or a day in the sun with our moisture-wicking headbands that help move perspiration away from the skin, helping you feel dry and comfortable all day long! Feel festive and spirited for your next Turkey Trot race or fun run!

THE PERFECT GIFT! Running out of fun ideas for your athlete or sports fan?! Our RokBANDs are the perfect gift for your team player or coach! Our RokBANDs feature an allover colorful design or pattern, making these headbands one-of-a-kind! Choose from a wide variety of colors and designs to find your favorite! RokBANDs are guaranteed to add some serious style to any outfit!

UNIQUE DESIGN! RokBANDs are multi-functional headbands with a unique design that is engineered to be worn for all daily and physical activities. The fabric can be folded to the width or thickness you want, you can wear it as a headband, hair band, or even like a beanie. Unrolled completely, it makes an excellent scarf, neck gaiter, or can be twisted around a ponytail like a scrunchie or worn as a wristband!

PRINTED IN THE USA! All of our RokBANDs are printed proudly right here in the USA! Each RokBAND is made by RunTechnology and measures 9" x 10". With added UV Protection UPF 19+, our RokBANDs will keep you covered and protected to sun exposure during any of your activities! One size fits most adults and children. Each RokBAND is machine washable, so you can keep them fresh and clean for all your daily activities! Do not iron.

DESIGNED AND SOLD BY Gone For a RUN - A USA based, family operated business located in Connecticut. We pride ourselves on the integrity and quality of our products and firmly stand behind all that we sell. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, please contact us so we can make it right.
description: Our RokBands are a multifunctional headband with a unique design that are engineered to be worn for all daily and physical activities. The fabric can be folded to the width or thickness you want, you can wear it as a headband, hair band, or even like a beanie. Unrolled completely, it makes an excellent mask or scarf, but can be twisted around a ponytail like a scrunchie or worn as a wristband. With so many uses the Rokbands are sure to be the perfect headband for daily wear and during any physical activity.
